projects.title: CoinPrint
projects.description: Constructed an eco-friendly application with e-wallet feature and go-green options for the user by using Photoshop

projects.title: MiCommunity
projects.description: Established a better social media experience for users.

projects.title: Houston Almanac
projects.description: Published a simple newsletter that people without Internet or access to technology could read by using WordPress.

projects.title: Eagle On Campus
projects.description: One of the first websites I was working on as Secretary of Student Government Association. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: The Autonomous Underground Mapping Radar Auger (AUMRA)
projects.description: The AUMRA is proposed as a way of gaining this information through an autonomous drilling rover, capable of sending data about the underground environment through multiple instruments and providing a closer look underneath the moon's surface.

projects.title: Actuated Surface Laser Activated Nominal ‚Äì Ice Detector
projects.description: Team Dias will further advance the research required to establish a sustainable human presence on the Moon. This will be done by validating the existence of water ice within the Permanently Shadowed Regions (PSRs) located in Shoemaker on the Lunar South Pole. The lander designed for the mission is named ASLAN-ID (Actuated Surface) Laser Activated Nominal - Ice Detector)
